main event: A UFO sighting was reported near Springfield, Missouri on March 21, 1961.
interesting points: The object was visually observed as a pulsating light about the size of a silver dollar and appeared to remain stationary for 20 minutes,The sighting was confirmed by a radar operator who tracked the object,It was reported by a tower operator along with 4-5 additional witnesses on the ground,The object had no lights and would intermittently appear brighter or dimmer,The document is part of the Project Blue Book records which aimed to investigate unidentified aerial phenomena.
witness description: tower operator and several witnesses on the ground
